Author: Microsoft Events
Description:
Take command of your AI fleet! Discover how Observability in Foundry Control Plane gives you real-time visibility, ironclad governance, and the power to optimize every agent. If you run AI at scale, this is the session that will change how you monitor, optimize, and govern every agent, securely with Microsoft Foundry. If reliability and compliance matter, this session is your playbook.

Title: AI Operations to own the fleet master the mission in Microsoft Foundry | BRK205
